intro_only_event_multi_anniversary/6901_:
Hey, how’s it going? Have you gotten all settled
on Pasio?

I can tell just by looking at you that you’ve
changed a lot since we first met. You’re full of
determination now!

Don’t let it go to your head, though. That’s just
asking for trouble.

but it’s so obvious that you and Red are interested
in [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Well, with strong Trainers like us as role models,
the next generation of Trainers is definitely gonna
give us some exciting battles to look forward to!

We wanna see for ourselves just how strong
you’re gonna get here on Pasio!

Would you like to come do some special training
with us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

We’re training with some of the other strong
Trainers on Pasio.
I bet it would be a good experience for you!
Wow, Red sure seems fired up about it...

I’m cool with it, too. We’re strong Trainers on our
own, but as a team, we’d be unstoppable!

I’ll show you the secret to true strength! Try to
keep up, OK?
intro_only_event_multi_anniversary/6801_:
Hey, do you two remember what it felt like when
you first met your partner Pokémon?

What kinda question is that to suddenly spring on
us? And yeah, of course I remember!

It’s just that, when I wear this sygna suit, I feel a
deeper connection with my partner Pokémon than
I’ve ever felt before.
It’s almost nostalgic in a way, y’know?
Yeah, I think I get what you mean!

I can remember back when Gramps let me choose
my first Pokémon.
Hehe. Right? It was like fate.
It felt like the beginning of a great adventure!
Even if I could go back in time to that moment...
I’d still make the same choice, that’s for sure!
You feel the same way, don’t you, Red?

Just goes to show that we all ended up with the
perfect partner Pokémon.

Talking about this makes me want to battle!
Let’s head out and train!
intro_only_event_multi_anniversary/6802_:
I’m ready to show you
what I’ve got!

This sygna suit makes me feel like I could take on
the world!

I have to challenge everyone I see to a battle!
I just can’t help myself!

It’s fun to be able to battle against so many
different sync pairs, isn’t it?

It sure is! Pasio is the perfect place to
get stronger.
I managed to find a new goal here, too.

Y’know how we’ve met a lot of up-and-coming
Trainers here on Pasio who all admire us?
I feel like it might be our duty to watch over them.
You two sure have come a long way.

Don’t get me wrong, though. I’m still gonna get
way stronger, too!
